name: GasBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Gas Buddy to find the cheapest gas”
”Alexa, ask Gas Buddy to find the closest gas station with a bathroom”
”Alexa, ask Gas Buddy if two dollars seventy cents is a good price for regular?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gas buddy
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The GasBuddy skill uses our community of millions of Gas Buddies to get you the most current information on fuel prices, the most accurate ratings of convenience store coffee or clean bathrooms, and will even let you buy fuel at a Love's™ gas station. You can also report gas prices on the go with a voice-only interface to get us the latest prices for a station.

Some features of the GasBuddy skill require customers to have the GasBuddy mobile app downloaded and installed.
